title: Amazon Digital Music Head Steve Boom on the Companys Streaming Strategy
text:
Amazon Digital Music Head Steve Boom on the Company's Streaming Strategy 
Billboard Biz Saturday 24th October, 2015 
A year ago, Amazon was being watched very carefully. The company had released a widely panned, now-discontinued smartphone, causing a stock tumble despite having moved into producing innovative original programming like Transparent. A year later, and one glowing earnings release later, and Jeff Bezos is the third-richest person in the U.S., with its stock ballooning by $40 per share today (no word on whether Bezos will be giving...
